title: stuck at login
body:
could somebody help me?

ive recently come across a problem where i cant login to the server. the screen says "logging in" for like 2 minutes and then says "cannot conenct to the pvp server". this has been going on for 3 days now. mac user btw

replies.body: I have the same issue on Mac OS Sierra. Super annoying. Please help.

It sounds like your network is failing to connect to the login servers, so it can't authenticate and get you in.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and go through each step for the fix.  Make sure to select the Mac options for instructions specific to your OS.  Hope that helps!
ive tried all of those steps as well. i think it might have to do with your guys' end
